dt-example.title: PDF message
dt-example.info: It can often be useful to include description text in the print view to provide summary information about the table that will be included in the generated PDF. The `message` option of the `b-button pdfFlash` button type provides this ability. It is a simple string and cannot contain any formatting information. If you require control over the styling of the exported PDF, please refer to the `b-button pdfHtml5` button type.
